text: The mass of men lead lives of quiet desperation. What is called resignation is confirmed desperation.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: When a hundred men stand together, each of them loses his mind and gets another one.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: Men are born to succeed, not to fail.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: Liberty means responsibility. That is why most men dread it.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: One man that has a mind and knows it can always beat ten men who haven't and don't.
author: George Bernard Shaw
